/usr/bin/c++   -g   CMakeFiles/async_client_server.dir/aserver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/async_client_server.dir/client.cpp.o  -o async_client_server -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_serialization.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so -lboost_system
